name: 西蒙妮·奥古斯塔斯
name_full: 西蒙妮·奥古斯塔斯 Seimone Augustus
introduction: Seimone Delicia Augustus is a former American professional basketball player who last played for the Los Angeles Sparks of the Women's National Basketball Association, Dynamo Kursk, and the U.S. national team. She was drafted by the Minnesota Lynx first overall in the 2006 WNBA Draft, and left to sign with the Sparks 14 years later. An eight-time all-star, Augustus has become one of the most recognizable faces in the WNBA, earning MVP honors while leading the Lynx to the 2011 WNBA championship, the first of four that she won with the team.
